memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, Forcing< float > XForcing, EvolvingP< T > &XEv, T *&zb)
memberdef.name: initevolv

briefdescription.para: Initialize evolving variables for the simulation.

detaileddescription.para: Handles hotstart, coldstart, and warmstart initialization of water level, velocity, and bathymetry arrays. Applies offsets and boundary conditions as needed.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< float > XBlock, Forcing< float > XForcing, EvolvingP< float > &XEv, float *&zb)
memberdef.name: initevolv< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< double > XBlock, Forcing< float > XForcing, EvolvingP< double > &XEv, double *&zb)
memberdef.name: initevolv< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T *zb, EvolvingP< T > &XEv)
memberdef.name: coldstart

briefdescription.para: Cold start initialization of evolving variables.

detaileddescription.para: Sets initial water level, velocity, and bathymetry arrays for all blocks using specified zsinit and zsoffset.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, BlockP< T > XBlock, T *zb, EvolvingP< T > &XEv)
memberdef.name: warmstart

briefdescription.para: Warm start initialization using boundary conditions and interpolation.

detaileddescription.para: Sets initial water level, velocity, and bathymetry arrays for all blocks using boundary segments and atmospheric pressure forcing.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, BlockP< T > XBlock, T *zb, EvolvingP< T > &XEv)
memberdef.name: warmstartold

briefdescription.para: Legacy warm start initialization using inverse distance to boundaries.

detaileddescription.para: Sets initial water level, velocity, and bathymetry arrays for all blocks using inverse distance interpolation from boundaries.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > &XEv, T *zb)
memberdef.name: AddZSoffset

briefdescription.para: Add offset to surface elevation (zs) and update water depth (h).

detaileddescription.para: Applies zsoffset to zs and updates h for all blocks where h > eps.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > &XEv, T *&zb)
memberdef.name: readhotstartfileBG

briefdescription.para: Read BG_Flood hotstart file and extract block attributes.

detaileddescription.para: Opens NetCDF hotstart file, checks for BG_Flood attribute, and closes file.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > &XEv, T *&zb)
memberdef.name: readhotstartfile

briefdescription.para: Read hotstart file and initialize evolving variables and bathymetry.

detaileddescription.para: Reads NetCDF hotstart file, extracts variables, and fills arrays for all blocks. Handles missing variables and applies edge corrections.

simplesect.para: Success flag (1 if successful, 0 if fallback to cold start)

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< float > XBlock, EvolvingP< float > &XEv, float *&zb)
memberdef.name: readhotstartfile< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< double > XBlock, EvolvingP< double > &XEv, double *&zb)
memberdef.name: readhotstartfile< double >
